title: Is anyone ells getting really BAD Lag or DC'ing
body: i go into games with no problem (most of the time) then once minions spawn everything breaks loose, im lucky if i can get 10-20 ms, then i DC which i feel bad - This has been happening for a while now, i read some post and people say just stop playing BUT i spent money on league i cant just throw money away like that PLZ if anyone know a solution Halp!!{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: We should be able to fix this up!  Your might have some driver issues or even bad game files that's struggling to render properly when things start gettingheated.  In your video settings, a framecap setting as well as disabling vsync may help.  Otherwise, run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out some possibilities, then test it in a custom game.
I also have turn EVERYTHING down still no halp {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
